### -v1.1.16 
 * fixes crash on theme change. 

### -v1.1.15 
 * fix search filter 
 * added character, staff, studio filters 
 * fix season screen text disappearing 
 * etc 

### -v1.1.14 
 * Added search type in search screen. 
 * Swipe to refresh in home screen. 
 * 12hr airing format. 
 	 * Change from Settings -> Application 
 * Save recent search filter history (filter except search query) 
 * Changing status bar to transparent 
 * Fix 'Something went wrong' after app remains in background for long time. 
 * Tag exclusion in Discover and Season from filter setting. 
 * Open media info directly from link in activity. 

### -v1.1.13 
 * Fixed crashing on some media stats. 
 * Fixed Anime/Manga list filter not saving. 
 * User anime and media stats overview is separated. 
 * Widget related issues fixed. 
 * User activity related issues fixed. 

### -v1.1.12 
 * Theme settings has be modified. 
 	 * Choose theme mode and then theme to correctly apply theme. 
 	 * To enable customization, select __Customize__ from theme dropdown. 
 	 * There is also other theme setting, personalize according to your taste. 
 * Notification changes. 
 	 * Notification badge without count will be shown if notification is not read. 
 	 * Fixed bugs related to some notification not showing up in list.
 * List 
 	 * Custom List is now shown with count. 
 	* Custom List can be added from settings. 
 	 * List entry editor design has been changed. 
 * Search 
 	 * Search filters has been improved. 
 	 * Text search on text change. 
 * Support for Hiatus status. 
 * Friend List now shows mutual. 
 * Bugs 
 	 * Missing save button in settings has been fixed. 
 	 * List activity delete doing nothing fixed. 
 	 * Typos fixed. 
 * Other fixes, optimization, and changes 
 * __Translator__. Thank you for the contribution. 
 	 * Spanish - MrJako2001 [AniList](https://anilist.co/user/MrJaco/) 

### -v1.1.11 
 * Added activity section in home screen, user screen and media browse screen. 
 * Compose activity, reply or create message with preview support. 
 * Support for AniList Flavored Markdown as close as possible. 
 * Several notification related issue fixed.
 * Transparent bars removed due to several complication.
 * Theme will primarily focused on background and accent color only.
 * Several internal changes and bug fixes.

### -v1.1.10 
 * Airing Schedule App Widget. 
 * Use translation model from setting to translate the description of media. Line break and other styling will be gone if available. 
 * Fix manga volume progress not updating 
 * Ui changes and other bug fixes

### -v1.1.0-base 
 * New Design. Customizable theme.
 * Browse media with complete detail.
 * Browse Suggestion.
 * Search Anime, Manga, Studio, Staff with customization
 * Airing Schedules.
 * Responsive bookmark icon.
 * Supports Spoiler text, images, youtube, etc
